sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {Col, Container, Image, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../style/service.css' function Service() { const [yoga, setYoga] = useState([]) console.log(yoga) useEffect(() =>{ fetch('./yoga.JSON') .then(res=> res.json()) .then(data=> setYoga(data)) },[]) return (

Services

{ yoga && yoga.map((item)=>( <>

{item.name}

{item.category}

Online Training:$ {item.online} In-House : $ {item.offline}

{item.desc}

 )) }
) } export default Service
